Interface ContextProxySpec

All Known Implementing Classes:

public interface ContextProxySpec

This interface describe services offered by context follower implementation

getDevicesInSpaces

java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getDevicesInSpaces(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> typeList,
                                                         java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> spaces)
Return the devices of a list of type presents in the places

Parameters:
typeList - the list of types to look for (if empty, return all objects)
spaces - the spaces where to find the objects (if empty return all places)
Returns:
a list of objects contained in these spaces

getEventsFromState

                                    java.lang.String stateName)
Get the state representation for a device type in the grammar

Parameters:
objectId - the device from which to get the state representation
stateName - the specific state to extract
Returns:
the state description
